titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Eli Whitney Debevoise papers FA1284

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2017-06-20 00:00:12 -0400.

physdesc.extent: 2 standard record storage boxes and 1 document box.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The collection was donated to the RAC in 1992 by James B. Welles, Jr. (Executor of Debevoise estate).

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: RAC has legal title, copyright and literary rights to the material in so far as it holds them.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Eli Whitney Debevoise (1899-1990) was an attorney in New York City and the senior partner in the law firm Debevoise, Plimpton.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The file includes correspondence, Debevoise's meeting notes, transcripts of public hearings, clippings, background materials and reports.

did.unittitle: New York Special Legislative Commitee on Integrity and Ethical Standards in Government

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The file includes correspondence, Debevoise's meeting notes, transcripts of public hearings, clippings, background materials and printed copies of the Committee's final report (dated: March 9, 1954).

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Debevoise was appointed a member of this committee by Governor Thomas E. Dewey.

did.unittitle: Governor's Committee to Review New York Laws and Procedures in the Area of Human Rights

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This file includes the committee's report and correspondence.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Debevoise was appointed to the chairmanship of this committee by Governor Nelson A. Rockefeller.

did.unittitle: Task Force on Youth and Juvenile Deliquency

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The file includes correspondence, a summary, meeting agendas and background material in the form of printed reports by other organizations, papers, articles, statistics and newspaper clippings. Also included are drafts and proofs of the final report as well as a card file of individuals and institutions the task force relied upon for information and assistance.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Governor Nelson A. Rockefeller appointed Debevoise chairman of this task force.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The file contains correspondence and press clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The file contains correspondence and press clippings.
